snippet: The prosecutor, Christopher L. Garcia, will join Weil, Gotshal & Manges, one of the country's largest corporate law firms, as a partner in its white-collar defense and investigations group.
abstract: The prosecutor, Christopher L. Garcia, will join Weil, Gotshal & Manges, one of the country's largest corporate law firms, as a partner in its white-collar defense and investigations group.
lead_paragraph: Christopher L. Garcia, a federal prosecutor who helped lead the government's widespread crackdown of insider trading on Wall Street, is leaving the Justice Department for the private sector.

headline.main: Prosecutor in Insider Crackdown Leaving U.S. Attorney's Office
